nameEntry.part: Friends of the University of Alberta

biogHist.p: The aim of the Friends of the University of Alberta is to promote good relations between the University and the citizens of the province and to raise money for University programs not covered by normal funding sources like government grants and students' fees. Its fundraising supports services such as special library acquisitions, scholarships and bursaries, and sponsorship of the Henry Marshall Tory Lecture Series, which was instituted by the Friends in 1956.
